description: Product Description ALREADY MORE THAN 2 MILLION PLAYERS ! WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU PLAYED CATEGORIES? Enjoy the brand-new take on Categories in an exciting card game format where kids and adults come together to play! CRACK LIST - THE BEST GAME TO PLAY WITH CHILDREN, FAMILY OR FRIENDS. Discover the ultimate mix of board games, kids' games, card games, and family games ‚Äì perfect for beach trips and travel ‚Äì an all-in-one solution for adults and kids! A SIMPLE CONCEPT, LAUGHTER GUARANTEED! HOW TO PLAY ? Each player gets 8 cards. A category is picked, and players take turns giving answers that match the category and start with a letter in their hand. THE ACTION CARDS Watch out for the ACTION cards and the + LETTER cards, which are guaranteed to turn the whole game on its head! CATEGORY CARDS Hundreds of whacky, playful, controversial, poetic and unexpected category lists... HOW TO WIN? Aim of the game : Be the first to get rid of all your cards. Crack List is played in 3 winning rounds. Are you ready to become king of the Crack List? The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. The video shows the product being unpacked. Video Player is loading. Click to play video Play Mute Current Time  0:00 / Duration  0:00 Loaded : 0% Stream Type  LIVE Seek to live, currently behind live LIVE Remaining Time  - 0:00   1x Playback Rate Chapters Chapters Descriptions descriptions off , selected Captions captions off , selected Audio Track Fullscreen This is a modal window. Learn the rules in just 1 minute and become the Crack List Champion! Expect challenges, displays of knowledge, a sprinkling of strategy and above all, lots of laughs! The added perk? It‚Äôs so small you can literally take it anywhere! The game that even unenthusiastic players love. Even those who generally loathe playing games keep coming back for more Crack List, A board game that brings everyone together: Categories in a card game version! PLAYING IS A FAMILY TRADITION It has already brought so much joy to our lives, with bursts of laughter, heated debates, and bold attempts to bluff... From 10 years old We recommend the game for ages 10 and up, but many families have shared that it works wonderfully with children as young as 7 or 8 years old. Playing time: 30 minutes A complete game with three rounds takes approximately 30 minutes. For 2 to 8 players The game accommodates 2 to 8 players, and even more can join by forming teams of 2 or 3. CONTENTS: 2 decks of 80 cards The GAME DECK (blue), which includes the LETTER and ACTION cards and The CATEGORY LIST DECK (red), which features 3 different categories per card
